reviews.review: classic game still one of the best shooter games in my opinion .

Only issues ive had is non-prime you get Cheaters that use : walls, aimbot, spinbot, etc; ive also had very bad stutter issues on the game. i have great internet and it fucks up a lot for no reason. either way i beam and shit on fools.
